title: What Should Never Be - Shaper Set Card 6 of 14
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Replace "until you draw one with a +1 in the used aspect" with until you choose to stop, and replace "use that challenge card" with use the last challenge card drawn.

Elder's notes: This is a powerful effect that can accidentally steamroll your game if you have bad enough luck that all the +1s are on the bottom of the challenge deck. Rather than changing its effect, we've simply added some guardrails to the card; now you can stop drawing whenever you like and use the last card drawn. You'll no longer have to worry about this card single-handedly ending the day just due to bad luck.
